## QNRemoteAudioTrack.setRemoteVolume() method

设置音量

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRemoteVolume(volume: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  volume | number | 音量值 默认 1 范围 \[0,10\] |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

设置当前 Track 播放音量大小
